application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of full details of all external facing materials (including manufacturer's specifications, photographs and/ or a physical sample), pursuant to Condition 3; detailed drawings of a typical bay of the front elevation of the building in plan, section and elevation at a scale of no less than 1:20 including the arrangement of the reinstated bottle balustrade and urns at parapet level to nos. 4 and 6 Hammersmith Broadway and junctions with adjacent buildings, pursuant to Condition 4 of planning permission reference: 2023/03212/FUL dated 3rd October 2024.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
